title: 0 BR/1BA DESIGNER APARTMENT WITH WASHER & DRYER - TWO WEEKS FREE!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Find work-life balance at The Union Flats.
Our luxury apartments in Union City CA offer one and two-bedroom apartments as well as studios and lofts.
Our apartment homes come with cozy and lavish features suited to your lifestyle.
Explore our city freely with easy access to the BART station, restaurants, shops, and entertainment.
In a neighborhood like ours, your life will be satisfying and your free time will be well spent.
The Union Flats, Union City apartments, has your new home waiting for you.
Feel free to look at our photo gallery and see what we have to offer.
Give us a call today for more information and to schedule your tour!
The Union Flats welcomes your dogs & cats!
Our homes accommodate up to 2 pets per home.
Your pets will love it here!

Application Fee: $52.46 (Per person living in the home 18 years or older)Standard Security Deposit: $500.00 (Pending Credit Screening)Holding Deposit: $199.00 (This is what will allow us to hold a specific apartment while we process your information.
If approved, the $199.00 will go towards your security deposit)Pet Depost - $500.00 per pet | 2 pets per household | 50lbs or less full grown Pet Rent - Dogs: $50.00 | Cats: $35.00
